attributes.action: Establish a Steady Build plan for naval equipment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Steady state proposal

MPA 20x Nimrod MR.4
SAR Merlin HAS.7 x 6
AEW Merlin ASaC.8 x 12
ASW Merlin ASW x 42
ASuW Super Lynx x 38
COD/Tanker Merlin HAS.7 x 12
Air Defence F-35b x 36
Strike F-35b x 72
Recon F-35b x 12
EW F-35b(e) x 12

Submarines:
14 SSN (building a batch of four every seven years, one every 21 months)
(Vanguard SLEP for further 25 years)

Aircraft Carriers:
First aircraft carrier built all five blocks at once by 2014
Seven stages at 2 years per stage (fourteen year cycle)2nd by 2028
42 year service life (three aircraft carriers eventually)

Escorts:
12 AAW Destroyers (one every 14 months) then
16 ASW Frigates (one every 10.5 months)
28 year service life

Utility Vessels:
25 Multi-use corvettes (one a year)
25 year service life

Education 7% of GDP, Health 8% of GDP, Defence 4% of GDP, Social 6% of GDP
No more than 25% of GDP on the big four departments, 37.5% of GDP in government/council spending.
30% of GDP taxed on land rent value.
Up to 7.5% of GDP from licensing.
